p: The inhibitory effect of epiprogoitrin, progoitrin, epigoitrin and goitrin on hemagglutinin was examined to characterize the mode of their antiviral action. As shown in Fig. 3 , hemagglutinin was not inhibited in the reaction solution used as positive control, nor in the presence of epiprogoitrin, progoitrin, epigoitrin or goitrin, even at the highest concentration (5Â mg/mL) which exhibited antiviral activity.
